EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DealChicken invites you to be a part of 14 days of cool savings. From water parks and baseball games to movies and local events, DealChicken's Summer Fun promotion makes it easy for online shoppers to discover and connect with neighborhood merchants. A new merchant will be featured daily July 1-14 during our exclusive promotion. For more information, download our Summer Fun information sheet.
To reserve one of 14 featured Summer Fun positions, contact {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.OwnerLastName} by June 17th at {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
DealChicken alerts consumers to great deals. Consumers purchase the deal on DealChicken.com and redeem at your location or website. Merchants receive a revenue split less a 2.5% credit card processing fee.
